header.title: Reiki Healing and Aura Workshop Day

body: On the 8th of February we held a workshop at the Studio, with the theme of Aura seeing and strengthening, for well-being and self-care, and how that could be combined with Reiki treatments.

figure.caption: Room set up for a Yoga course

body: We are creating a new centre for alternative therapy treatments, and Reiki courses and workshops.
